message: Let's split 60/40. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  How about a 55/45 split to even things out?
I appreciate your counter-offer, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at 57.5/42.5?
This is getting us nowhere fast. I'm willing to accept a slightly smaller share to get this done. 52.5/47.5?
